results.title: A case of liver hemangioma with markedly reduced tumor size after metformin treatment: a case report.
results.text_hl: A 52-year-old man with a 9-year history of @<m>DISEASE_Hemangioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006391 @@@hepatic hemangioma@@@ was treated with the anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, resulting in complete remission of the @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@.

citations.NLM: Ono M, Sawada K, Okumura T. A case of liver hemangioma with markedly reduced tumor size after metformin treatment: a case report. Clin J Gastroenterol. 2017 Feb;10(1):63-67. PMID: 27995469
